mapper.select: SELECT ap.* FROM acl_permission ap LEFT JOIN acl_role_permission arp ON arp.permission_id = ap.id WHERE arp.role_id = (SELECT role_id FROM acl_user_role WHERE user_id = #{id})

SELECT ap.id AS id, ap.pid AS pid, ap.name AS name, ap.type AS type, ap.permission_value AS permissionValue, ap.path AS path, ap.component AS component, ap.icon AS icon, ap.`status` AS `status` FROM acl_permission ap LEFT JOIN acl_role_permission arp ON arp.permission_id = ap.id WHERE arp.role_id = #{id}
